title: 98/595/EC: Commission Decision of 13 October 1998 concerning the application for a compulsory beef labelling system in France and Belgium (notified under document number C(1998) 3050) (Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 13 October 1998 concerning the application for a compulsory beef labelling system in France and Belgium (notified under document number C(1998) 3050) (Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic) (98/595/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The French and Belgian requests, for the introduction of a compulsory labelling system for beef from animals born, fattened and slaughtered on their territory, are approved in accordance with Article 19(5) of Regulation (EC) No 820/97.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic and the Kingdom of Belgium.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 October 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 117, 7. 5. 1997, p. 1.
